Oluwayemisi's Portfolio

An Aspiring Full Stack Developer

My Story

Oluwayemisi's Cover Letter


Greetings! I am thrilled to introduce myself as an aspiring Full Stack Developer. I am eager to immerse myself in the dynamic world of software development and build powerful digital solutions that leave a lasting impact.

As I venture into this exciting realm, my passion for technology and the limitless possibilities it offers fuels my drive to become a well-rounded Full Stack Developer. I am captivated by the artistry of frontend design, where I can create captivating user interfaces that seamlessly engage and delight users, leaving them with an unforgettable experience.

Yet, my aspirations don't end there. I am equally drawn to the intricacies of backend development, where I get to architect robust and efficient systems that handle complex tasks with finesse. The idea of optimizing databases to ensure smooth data management excites me, knowing that this attention to detail can elevate the overall performance of applications.

What enthralls me the most about being a Full Stack Developer is the opportunity to bring together these diverse skills and seamlessly connect the frontend and backend, forming a cohesive whole that functions flawlessly. The prospect of bridging the gap between these two realms, ensuring smooth communication and integration, motivates me to constantly push my boundaries and refine my expertise.

To achieve my goals, I am committed to a lifelong journey of learning and growth. The world of technology evolves rapidly, and I eagerly embrace this ever-changing landscape. I dedicate myself to exploring the latest frameworks, languages, and tools, equipping myself with the knowledge and adaptability needed to create solutions that are not only cutting-edge but also future-proof.

Collaboration and communication are equally vital aspects of being a successful Full Stack Developer. I value the power of teamwork, recognizing that working alongside other talented professionals fosters creativity and results in stronger outcomes. I eagerly look forward to contributing my skills to cross-functional teams, united by a shared vision of delivering exceptional digital experiences.

Though I may be at the beginning of this fulfilling journey, I am excited about the challenges and opportunities that lie ahead. As an aspiring Full Stack Developer, my mission is to craft comprehen sive digital experiences that make a difference in the lives of users and the success of businesses.

With a heart full of curiosity, determination, and a thirst for knowledge, I set forth on this exhilarating path as an aspiring Full Stack Developer, ready to embrace every opportunity to learn, grow, and create remarkable solutions that leave an indelible mark on the digital landscape. Together, let's embark on this thrill!

My Skills

My Skills

What can I offer?

Languages learned thus far.

HTML

HTML (Hypertext Markup Language) is the standard language used to create and structure web pages on the internet.



Understand the basic structure of html ie, document, html, body.

How to use element tags like h,p etc.

How to use the anchor tag to create hyperlinks.

How to use tables, attributes, semantics element etc

"The proficiency of demonstrated in this context can be assessed at 90%.

Self-Motivation: Keep pushing forward with determination and resilience; success comes to those who never give up.

CSS

CSS is a language that styles web pages by defining presentation and layout, allowing developers to create visually appealing and consistent designs.



Understand how to effectively use inline, internal and external CSS.

Have a good understanding of CSS selectors.

Effective use of box-model, typography, colours and background.

A good understanding of layout and positioning, flex box and css animation.

"The proficiency of demonstrated in this context can be assessed at 90%.

Self-Motivation: "Embrace challenges and persevere!.

JavaScript

JavaScript is a high-level, interpreted programming language used to create interactive websites and web applications.



Embeding javascript in html

understand the use of variables, data type, operator expressions.

The use of conditional statements, loops, arrays, functions etc

Have an idea of ES6, AJAX

Efficient use of DOM manipulation.

"The proficiency of demonstrated in this context can be assessed at 60%, this is still a work in progress.

Self-Motivation: "You have the power to achieve your dreams!

My Skills

What can I offer?

Frame-Work learned thus far.

Bootstrap

Bootstrap is a powerful front-end framework for building responsive and visually appealing websites and web applications quickly.



Setting up bootstrap with use of CDN or it's file download.

How to use grid layout, bootstrap typographical classes and bootstraps components.

How to use bootstrap utilities

Customizing Bootstrap

"The proficiency of demonstrated in this context can be assessed at 70%.- Still a work in progress

Self-Motivation: Keep pushing forward with determination.

JQuery

jQuery is a fast and lightweight JavaScript library that simplifies DOM manipulation, event handling, AJAX interactions, and animation, making it easier for developers to build interactive and dynamic websites.



DOM manipulation with jQuery.

Event handling

Animation and its effect

A Customizing animations using CSS properties

"The proficiency of demonstrated in this context can be assessed at 50%- Still a work in progress.

Self-Motivation: "Embrace challenges and persevere!.

API

An API, which stands for Application Programming Interface, is a set of rules, protocols, and tools that allows different software applications to communicate and interact with each other.



Importance of API

Web and Library APIs

Understanding HTTP methods (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE)

API endpoints

"The proficiency of demonstrated in this context can be assessed at 50%- Still a work in progress.

Self-Motivation: "Embrace challenges and persevere!.
